item.title: Helping people trade their social media habits

description.p: Helping people trading their social media habits for something more satisfying.
Repurposing your otherwise mindless time with something structured
Find an article you’ve been meaning to read

Problem: I constantly curate content, but rarely go back and review it. I have content spewed across Instapaper, Feedly, Youtube, Notion, & Obsidian. How can I make sure that I can have all of this stuff in one central place?
Could it be positioned as an iOS widget that you put on your front page that gives you constructive content, or helps you reduce notification usage, or uninstall apps that are using your time.
Getting people to read is too high of a barrier, but how can we give them the joy and satisfaction of Readwise without having to read?
description.h3: 5 Minutes a day to a better you
